SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.repository

Class GreenSpaceRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.repository.GreenSpaceRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GreenSpaceRepository extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a repository for `GreenSpace` objects. It provides functionalities to manage green spaces, including adding, retrieving, validating, and printing them.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GreenSpaceRepository

      public GreenSpaceRepository()

  • Method Details

    • getGreenSpaceList

      public List<GreenSpace> getGreenSpaceList()
      Retrieves a list of all GreenSpace objects currently stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list containing all GreenSpaces.

    • addGreenSpace

      public Optional<GreenSpace> addGreenSpace(GreenSpace greenSpace)
      Adds a new green space to the list if it passes validation.
      Parameters:
      greenSpace - the green space to add
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the added green space if it passes validation, or an empty Optional if the green space is not valid

    • validateGreenSpace

      public boolean validateGreenSpace(GreenSpace greenSpace)
      Validates a `GreenSpace` object by checking if it already exists in the repository (based on name).
      Parameters:
      greenSpace - The `GreenSpace` object to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the green space is valid (not already present), false otherwise.

    • existsWithName

      public boolean existsWithName(String name)
      Checks if a green space with the given name already exists in the repository.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the green space to check.
      Returns:
      True if a green space with the given name exists, false otherwise.

    • existsWithAddress

      public boolean existsWithAddress(String address)
      Checks if a green space with the given address already exists in the repository.
      Parameters:
      address - The address of the green space to check.
      Returns:
      True if a green space with the given address exists, false otherwise.

    • serializateData

      public void serializateData()
      Serializes the GreenSpaceRepository object to a file. The repository is saved to a file named after the class with a ".bin" extension. This method handles the serialization process and writes the object state to a file.

    • getSeralizatedData

      public void getSeralizatedData()
      Deserializes the GreenSpaceRepository object from a file and adds the data to the current repository. The repository is read from a file named after the class with a ".bin" extension. This method handles the deserialization process and reads the object state from a file.

    • getGreenSpaceManagedByMe

      public List<GreenSpace> getGreenSpaceManagedByMe(String loggedInUser)
      Retrieves a list of green spaces managed by the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - The email or identifier of the logged-in user.
      Returns:
      A list of GreenSpace objects managed by the logged-in user. If no green spaces are found, an empty list is returned.
